text: Satyadev Narayan Arya (born 1 July 1937) is an Indian politician. On July 7, 2021, he became the 19th Governor of Tripura. He also worked as the 16th governor of Haryana from 2018 to 2021. He is a leader of BJP from Bihar. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Governors of Haryana
title: Satyadev Narayan Arya
